title: How to Unlock the Hardcore Championship on SmackDown vs. Raw 2009

steps.headline: On the Main Menu (not the start menu) go under "Game Modes".
Select a character in the menu.
steps.description: If you have a Custom Character, you can use it.

steps.headline: Finish every path until you get a message saying "Hardcore Championship Path Unlocked".
Collect stars from your matches to advance to the #1 Contendership Match, in which is a Tables Match.
steps.description: Put your opponent through a table to win.

steps.headline: After you win the Tables Match, you will be able to choose if you want to challenge the Hardcore Champion or not.
You will then be hovered over "Hardcore Champion: Matt Hardy(1974-)."
Defeat Matt Hardy.
steps.description: After you win, it will say "Objective Met: Defeat the Hardcore Champion: You have unlocked the Hardcore Championship. You may now use it in Exhibition anytime!"

text: Finding It On the Main Menu (not the start menu) go under "Game Modes".  Enter "Career Mode".  Select a character in the menu. If you have a Custom Character, you can use it. The Paths Go on the Intercontinental Championship.  Finish every path until you get a message saying "Hardcore Championship Path Unlocked".  The Hardcore Championship Collect stars from your matches to advance to the #1 Contendership Match, in which is a Tables Match. Put your opponent through a table to win. After you win the Tables Match, you will be able to choose if you want to challenge the Hardcore Champion or not. Choose "Championship Match". You will then be hovered over "Hardcore Champion: Matt Hardy(1974-)." Select that. Defeat Matt Hardy. After you win, it will say "Objective Met: Defeat the Hardcore Champion: You have unlocked the Hardcore Championship. You may now use it in Exhibition anytime!"
